framework.name: HIPAA
framework.description: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act - Security Rule
framework.authority: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services

controls.title: Security Management Process
controls.description: Implement policies and procedures to prevent, detect, contain, and correct security violations

controls.title: Assigned Security Responsibility
controls.description: Identify the security official responsible for development and implementation of policies

controls.title: Workforce Security
controls.description: Implement policies and procedures to ensure appropriate access to ePHI

controls.title: Information Access Management
controls.description: Implement policies and procedures for authorizing access to ePHI

controls.title: Security Awareness and Training
controls.description: Implement security awareness and training program for all workforce members

controls.title: Security Incident Procedures
controls.description: Implement policies and procedures to address security incidents

controls.title: Contingency Plan
controls.description: Establish policies and procedures for responding to emergencies or disasters

controls.title: Evaluation
controls.description: Perform periodic technical and nontechnical evaluation

controls.title: Facility Access Controls
controls.description: Implement policies to limit physical access to electronic information systems

controls.title: Workstation Use
controls.description: Implement policies for proper functions and physical attributes of workstations

controls.title: Workstation Security
controls.description: Implement physical safeguards for workstations that access ePHI

controls.title: Device and Media Controls
controls.description: Implement policies for receipt, removal, and disposal of hardware and electronic media

controls.title: Access Control
controls.description: Implement technical policies to allow only authorized access to ePHI

controls.title: Unique User Identification
controls.description: Assign a unique name and/or number for identifying and tracking user identity

controls.title: Encryption and Decryption
controls.description: Implement mechanism to encrypt and decrypt ePHI

controls.title: Audit Controls
controls.description: Implement mechanisms to record and examine activity in systems that contain ePHI

controls.title: Integrity
controls.description: Implement policies to protect ePHI from improper alteration or destruction

controls.title: Person or Entity Authentication
controls.description: Implement procedures to verify persons or entities seeking access to ePHI

controls.title: Transmission Security
controls.description: Implement measures to guard against unauthorized access during transmission
